comment_text: I believe the words 'under God' should remain in our pledge. This country was founded on solid Christian principals. We have been blessed and became a great nation because we believed and lived up to these principals. The farther we get from our source of greatness which is God, the more morally corrupt we become. Our nation is being destroyed from within as we continue to take God out of our lives.
argument_text: Under God  is part of American tradition and history
